body:
I'm Platinum. I'm a Minecraft Gamer. A Youtuber. And much more...

But lately, I've been lacking to post on my channel. So I decided to start fresh and have a complete revamp. In a couple days, I will be launching my Super Craft Bros series. I'm also doing a new Hunger Games series.

Please show your support by liking any of my videos or subscribing:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfGVQDrRu7ux4FFs-iB-Rlg/feed

My subscriber goal is 50 subscribers, which then I will do a 50 subscriber party on a few servers! Hope you guys all enjoy...:)

-ItzPlatinumYT

title: ItzPlatinumYT [CHANNEL UPDATE]

replies.body: Erru platinum, it's a nice channel you got there ^-^... However, it would be best if you made Avicus videos, for now I'll move this to off topic, Media is only avicus related things :c
